text: Esther Williams, the swimming champion turned actress who starred in glittering and aquatic Technicolor musicals of the 1940s and 1950s, has died. Williams died early Thursday in her sleep, according to her longtime publicist Harlan Boll. Williams in a bathing suit became a favorite pinup of GI's in World War II, and her popularity continued afterward.
title: Esther Williams, Olympic swimmer turned actress and pinup girl, dies at 91.
